title: 2013 - The Year In Christian Music (Bundle 55)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2013 - THE YEAR IN CHRISTIAN MUSIC
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

We have now shared 1,602 Christian music titles amongst ourselves this year.  I can't help but to continue to pray that, through some of that music, we are all drawn nearer to God almighty.  Amen?

The genre breakdown for today's 55th bundle might look something like this...

PRAISE & WORSHIP: Brad And Rebekah.  HIP-HOP/RAP: Cardec Drums, Jaeson Ma, Jahaziel.  SINGER-SONGWRITER: Come Wind, Evan Wickham, Heath McNease.  POP: Deleasa, Francy And The First-Time Feeling, Justin Warren Teseniar, Racoon, Warr Acres.  DANCE: DJ Amay.  ROCK: Embers In Ashes.  METAL/HARDCORE: Fit For A King, Sierra, Silence The Assembly, Stand Your Ground, They Will Fall.  JAZZ: Gary Meggs And Ezekiel 318, Herb Wilks.  INSTRUMENTAL: Hammock.  GOSPEL: Hanjo Gabler, Liz McComb, The McCrary Sisters, William McDowell.  CONTEMPORARY: Heavens To Betsy, Kyle Kupecky, Pacific Gold.  ALTERNATIVE: Hotel Books, Mattie Montgomery.  PUNK: MxPx.

...and

If you haven't already, please be sure to check out my "Various - 2013 - Piratebay Christian Music Mixtape, Vol 3" torrent from earlier today.  It's a collection of my personal Christmas Music Playlist which I have been working on, listening to, and forever tweaking since 2009.  I went ahead and shared it with everyone today.

Bundle 55 includes the following 33 releases...

 * Brad And Rebekah - 2013 - When We Gather
 * Cardec Drums - 2013 - Birthday Wishes And Bad Decisions
 * Come Wind - 2013 - Gold EP
 * Deleasa - 2013 - Lust For Love - Single
 * DJ Amay - 2013 - Don't Go To Church, Be The Church
 * Embers In Ashes - 2013 - Into My Arms - Single
 * Evan Wickham - 2013 - Make Us One
 * Fit For A King - 2013 - Descendants - Redux
 * Francy And The First-Time Feeling - 2013 - Francy And The First-Time Feeling
 * Gary Meggs And Ezekiel 318 - 2013 - He's Number One
 * Hammock - 2013 - Oblivion Hymns
 * Hanjo Gabler - 2013 - Gospelsongs Selected
 * Heath McNease - 2013 - American Snake Oil Salesmen Visit The Great White North
 * Heavens To Betsy - 2013 - Burning Bridges - Single
 * Herb Wilks - 2013 - Let's Share A Smile
 * Hotel Books - 2013 - This Is All We Have
 * Jaeson Ma - 2013 - Rise And Fall
 * Jahaziel - 2013 - Heads Up
 * Justin Warren Teseniar - 2013 - Everywhere And In Between
 * Kyle Kupecky - 2013 - On The Inside - Single
 * Liz McComb - 2013 - BrassLand
 * Mattie Montgomery - 2013 - See The Storm
 * McCrary Sisters, The - 2013 - All The Way
 * MxPx - 2013 - Take Me Out To The Ball Game - Single
 * Pacific Gold - 2013 - The Holly And The Ivy
 * Racoon - 2013 - Shoes Of Lightning - Single
 * Sierra - 2013 - Sierra EP
 * Silence The Assembly - 2013 - Reconstruction EP
 * Stand Your Ground - 2013 - The Chaos Around
 * They Will Fall - 2013 - Misconceptions EP
 * Warr Acres - 2013 - Hope Will Rise
 * William McDowell - 2013 - Withholding Nothing

For Him,
TorrentTracts - December 2013
